title: 10/12/21 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 10/12/21 DPS Hour 1 Mike Florio
description:
Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio joins Dan Patrick on The Dan Patrick Show.. Mike talks about Gruden's resignation from the Raiders. Mike also says that it is only fair that now we see all of the emails and not just Jon Gruden
